subject: Re: Oncobeta - Add new treatment site to website
preview: Hi Alyssa,  The 15 minutes were deducted from April's allocation, and the additional 5 minutes have been applied to this month's (May) allocation.  Please let me know if you have any questions.

full_threads.body:
Hi Alyssa,

The 15 minutes were deducted from April's allocation, and the additional 5 minutes have been applied to this month's (May) allocation.

Please let me know if you have any questions.

##- Please type your reply above this line -##

You are registered as a CC on this help desk request (support.combinate.me/hc/requests/30347).
Reply to this email to add a comment to the request.

----------------------------------------------

Alyssa Venturanza, 5 May 2025, 10:40 GMT+10

Thanks, Rica.

The original estimates given were 5-10 minutes, but we used 15 since there was a miss from your end that had to be fixed. Are we also going to be billed for those 5 minutes? Would this be invoiced separately?

Also, can you confirm if this used our allocated 15 minutes for April(not May)?

Regards,
Alyssa

Combinate
support@combinate.me
www.combinate.me
1300 247 018

----------------------------------------------

WolfIQ Support, 2 May 2025, 16:18 GMT+10

Hi Alyssa,

Apologies for the confusion.

The total time logged is 20 minutes, 15 minutes for the initial task and an additional 5 minutes for today’s update.

Please let me know if you need anything else!



Thanks,

**Rica Rosario Valencia**
support@wolfiq.com.au

![wolfiq.com.au](https://lh3.google.com/u/0/d/1m3NYUuXtUVyZ313zB6byGDnpd4zEEcb2=w3024-h1646-iv2)
**Impressed with our service? Click here to review us on Google!**

Your website Care Plan includes Developer Time, which is used to complete your requests. The included time varies across our plans:

- Lite Care Plans - 15 minutes / month
- Pro Care Plans - 120 minutes / month
- Expert Care Plans - 300 minutes / month
If you require extra Developer Time to complete this request, it will be billed at $129/hr inc GST. **_Please let us know if you would like a quote before we commence your request._**
